title: Myra Bag Dual Strap Cotton & Cowhide Bag S-1147
features: {Lightweight Canvas Purse} Introducing Myra Women's Dual Strap Cotton & Cowhide Bag- a lightweight and stylish bag that blends the best of both worlds! Made with a combination of cotton and cowhide, this bag is tough enough to stand up to daily wear and tear, while the cotton rug gives it a soft, comfortable feel. The high-quality cowhide leather adds an extra touch of luxury, making this bag perfect for any occasion.

{Perfect for Day or Weekend Trips} Myra Women's Dual Strap Cotton & Cowhide Bag is the perfect bag for everyday use. It's spacious and has a sturdy wrist strap that makes it easy to carry. The bag is also very well organized and secure, making it perfect for school, work or travel. The cowhide leather bottom is also very durable, ensuring that your bag will last for years to come. Dimensions: Width 12" x Height 9.5" with a Handle of 5.5 and Strap of 28.5"
